text:
We need progress, not a return to normal.

I sat down with @EmTSuss for @92Y’s #XYZSummit and #YourPrimaryPlaylist to talk about the #coronavirus pandemic, the inequities it exposes in our current system, and more. Hear our whole conversation here: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/wonder-media-network-2/your-primary-playlist http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1260267813807235074/pu/img/Jilj9oAtdgl2DuF3.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1260267813807235074/pu/vid/320x320/21SR_YikSb-3EYhW.mp4?tag=10

Congratulations to the advocates fighting the Keystone XL pipeline!

If we believe a clean environment and indigenous rights matter more than Big Oil’s short-term profits, then rejecting this disastrous project is a no-brainer. https://www.commondreams.org/news/2020/05/12/again-finding-us-permit-invalid-federal-court-upholds-block-climate-busting-keystone

Trump has played politics and catered to his cronies at every step of his "response" to this crisis. My bill with Sen. Blumenthal, Rep. @PramilaJayapal and Rep. @JohnSarbanes will hold this administration accountable and ensure they can't use coronavirus as cover for corruption. https://twitter.com/ABCPolitics/status/1260219457982607361 QT @ABCPolitics A group of Democrats seeking stronger oversight of coronavirus relief programs is introducing a new bill to force companies to report how they're using the funds. https://trib.al/2ys5rTR

It flies in the face of our Constitution that a secret court can authorize invading an innocent American’s privacy. Recent months have once again made all too clear how such a system leads to abuse. Read more: https://www.paul.senate.gov/news/sen-rand-paul-offer-amendment-house-passed-fisa-bill-protect-americans-privacy-reform-system

During today’s U.S. Senate Health, Education, Labor and Pensions Committee hearing I reiterated my call for power to be disbursed as much as possible among states instead of instituting a “one-size-fits-all,” national plan on reopening America: https://www.paul.senate.gov/news/dr-rand-paul-dr-fauci-as-much-i-respect-you-i-don%E2%80%99t-think-youre-end-all

Churches, synagogues & other houses of worship are pillars in our society, providing comfort & aid to those who are hurting. Congress must work to ensure faith-based institutions are not forced to shut down their services out of fear of frivolous lawsuits. https://www.foxnews.com/faith-values/faith-leaders-congress-liability-lawsuits-coronavirus

Today, I'm proud to partner with @WhipClyburn and @RepMarciaFudge on my VoteSafe Act. We're experiencing a public health crisis in the middle of an election year, and we must ensure that voting is safe and accessible for all.

Despite being months into this pandemic, we still lack real-time data at the @CDCgov. Comprehensive, current data on #COVID19 infection rates, disease spread, demographics, and testing is needed to better equip our country to reopen and handle future pandemics. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EX1adxJWAAY6OE2.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1260259910023090177/vid/480x270/kCsXDVA8ATFFipjU.mp4?tag=13

The VoteSafe Act is about making sure that the American people can exercise their right to vote during this pandemic without risking their health. There are elections already underway in Wisconsin and California today.

This cannot wait. https://twitter.com/WhipClyburn/status/1260240361194127360 QT @WhipClyburn This pandemic has highlighted the many challenges Americans face while voting.

That's why I’m proud to join @SenKamalaHarris & @RepMarciaFudge to introduce the #VoteSafeAct today. 

It expands voting options to include voting by mail, early voting, & improves voter registration.

Step 3: Strengthen the Congressional Oversight Commission tasked with oversight of the CARES Act bailout. They need subpoena power for all testimony & documents, & their work should be expanded to include @SBAgov’s troubled Paycheck Protection Program. #StopCOVIDCorruption

Step 6: Restrict lobbying & political spending. Lobbyists must disclose work related to COVID-19. No closed door meetings or calls. And any company bailed out should be banned from lobbying or political spending for at least a year after the loan is repaid. #StopCOVIDCorruption

Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you.

John 14:27
